invocation-schema.title: Invocation manifest for DTIPREP: DWI Quality Assurance Report

gear.author: DTIPrep (Francois Budin <fbudin@unc.edu>)
gear.description: DTIPrep performs a Study-specific Protocol based automatic pipeline for DWI/DTI quality control and preparation. This is both a GUI and command line tool. The configurable pipeline includes image/diffusion information check, padding/Cropping of data, slice-wise, interlace-wise and gradient-wise intensity and motion check, head motion and Eddy current artifact correction, and DTI computing. Version 1.2.4
gear.label: DTIPREP: DWI Quality Assurance Report
gear.name: qa-dtiprep
